title.rendered: Vigo Low Stool – with Seat Panel

content.rendered:
The ever popular Vigo Low Stool is now available with a range of different seat panel choices, allowing you to customize and create the perfect stool for you!

This industrial designer stool is now available with a pine seat or upholstered seat pad. The pine seat pads are in stock, and the upholstery has a lead time of 1-2 weeks from order.

The Vigo Stools are available in a choice of different colours.

The Vigo is held in stock for delivery in 3 working days.

Stackable up to 4 high.

For indoor use only.
